entry.title: alirezahoseini/music-player: A simple and lightweight music player built with Vanilla JavaScript and pure CSS. Features include dark mode, volume control, favorites, repeat, and playlists.
entry.content: A simple and lightweight music player built with Vanilla JavaScript and pure CSS. Features include dark mode, volume control, favorites, repeat, and playlists.

entry.title: AlphaIsYour/tokoeno: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.
entry.content: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.

entry.title: vladstsk/httio: Modern, lightweight HTTP client for JavaScript, with handy tools for working with requests and responses.
entry.content: Modern, lightweight HTTP client for JavaScript, with handy tools for working with requests and responses.

entry.title: messier433/TinySvgPlot: Yet another java-script-based SVG plotting tool with interactive elements. With no external dependencies and 15kB min file-size its smaller than typical interactive plotting scripts.
